channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Revolution Comes to the Kingdom
channel.description:
We’re doing something a little different in the newest episode of Fear of a Black Dragon. In this one, I interview Tom about his OSR project, Revolution Comes to the Kingdom. Check it out here:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/revolution-comes-to-the-kingdom

item.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Revolution Comes to the Kingdom
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

This was fascinating episode! I am mulling backing Tom’s Patreon to get a look at this cool game. Combining a 20th century military/espionage frame story with intensely symbolic/spiritual dungeon delves is such a brilliant idea, and basing the dungeons on Evagrius Ponticus’s Eight Evil Thoughts is an unexpected twist!
